com.premiumminds.billy.core.persistence.dao
Interface DAO<T extends BaseEntity>

Type Parameters:
T - The entity type being managed by the DAO implementation
All Superinterfaces:
EntityFactory<T>
All Known Subinterfaces:

public interface DAO<T extends BaseEntity>
extends EntityFactory<T>

Method Detail

beginTransaction

void beginTransaction()
Initialized a transaction context

rollback

void rollback()
Rolls back the active transaction context, discarding all transaction changes.

setForRollback

void setForRollback()
Sets the active transaction for rollback. Meaning that the transaction will remain active but all changes will be discarded.

isSetForRollback

boolean isSetForRollback()
Tells whether a transaction is set for rollback or not

Returns:
true if the active transaction if set to rollback. Returns false otherwise.

Commits the active transaction

Tells whether a transaction is currently active or not
